improvement_list.improvement_desc: Division by zero error in the condition of the if statement.  This will cause a runtime exception.
Unreachable code. The condition `n / 0 == 5` will always throw an exception, preventing the execution of either the `if` or `else` blocks.
Unreachable code. The else block is unreachable due to the exception in the if statement.
Add input validation to check if the denominator is zero before performing the division operation.
Remove the unnecessary if condition that always throws an exception.
